responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I'm Tim aka Tech With Tim.

patterns: could i get something to eat
responses: We sell chocolate chip cookies for $2!

profile interface allows to display the personal data of a user! this interface allows you to change the profile picture! the image can be retrieved either from the gallery or from the camera then click on save
list of dishes allows a cook to add, modify or delete a dish as well as add a comment

to pass an order you must choose the list of dishes interface -> click on the desired dish-> click on add to basket-> choose the number of dishes, then click on the basket icon -> add comments if you want -> enter your address either manually or from geolocation data and finally click on place order

patterns: how can delivery list help me
responses: the order list interface displays for each cook the list of dishes that he must prepare them as well as a button that displays the location of the customer and the rating given for each dish by the customer
the order history interface displays for each customer the list of old orders he has placed as well as giving the customer the opportunity to rate the dishes
the main interface presents the list of cooks sorted by region and rating, when you click on a cook, a list of corresponding dishes will be displayed, you can also search for a specific cook by name
the statistics interface allows you to display the number of dishes sold either per week or per month
